amendment.description: Amendment adds drug take-back programs to the list of eligible grant uses under the Comprehensive Opioid Abuse Grant Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 114-551 to add drug take-back programs to the list of authorized uses for amounts made available under Section 3021(a) of the Comprehensive Opioid Abuse Grant Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Keating.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
